description:
The project is titled 'SHAMIYANA APP'. 

This project involves the development of a food delivery and ordering app for Shamiyana Cafe. The app will allow customers to order food online and simplify the ordering process, as well as provide a web portal to manage the cafe's operations. Skills used includes Flutter, Dart, Firebase. The project uses Flutter, Dart, Firebase. The project is titled 'RAPID'. 

RAPID is a web app that uses WebSockets and WebRTC APIs to enable users to play real-time games like chess with their friends, while having a one-to-one video call simultaneously. Skills used includes NodeJS, ExpressJS, Socket.IO, WebRTC, HTML, CSS, JS, Docker. The project uses NodeJS, ExpressJS, Socket.IO, WebRTC, HTML, CSS, JS, Docker. The project is titled 'SMART SENSING MIDDLEWARE'. 

This project is a web application to collect data from smart home devices and display it in graphical format for analysis and better understanding. It will enable users to gain insights from their data and help them make informed decisions. Skills used includes ReactJS, HTML, CSS. The project uses ReactJS, HTML, CSS.
